titles.title: A bill to exclude foreign reparation payments from consideration as income in determining eligibility and benefits under Federal housing assistance programs.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 4/19/1988--Introduced. Excludes foreign reparation payments from consideration as income in determining eligibility and benefits under specified housing assistance programs.
